name: PadPressed
overview: PadPressed is a Wordpress plug-in built to optimize browsing experience for a blog’s readers on an iPad. When a reader visits a blog from their iPad, the blog is automatically formatted to be tablet ready with swipe to advance gestures, accelerometer aware column formatting, touch navigation, and more. PadPressed makes your blog function like a native iPad app.
